description: The command center of your flesh vessel. This allows one to activate its suit to morph their gear into various armaments.
An intricate transmission device implanted on your head. Grants full control over the experimental bio-organic exoskeleton worn by its user.

A prototype version of the flesh has been infused on your chest with its veins creeping towards every parts of your body. It allows one to consume specialized, artificial flesh and convert it into bionic power. The process is slow, but highly renewable.
As it is interconnected to your stomach, the core can convert its content into bionic power. Can be toggled on and off anytime.

Command the flesh vessel to morph with:
<color_light_red>fighter armament</color> - <color_white>bone blades</color>
"Protruding on your joints are sharp and deadly curved blades composed of flesh and bones."

Command the flesh vessel to morph with:
<color_light_red>fighter armament</color> - <color_white>twisted veins</color>
"Your hands have bursted into several slender tentacle outgrowths, each tipped with a barbed stinger."

Command the flesh vessel to morph with:
<color_light_red>fighter armament</color> - <color_white>fleshpound</color>
"With compact mass of flesh covering your arms, every whack packs a wallop!"

Command the flesh vessel to morph with:
<color_light_red>fighter armament</color> - <color_white>jawed biters</color>
"Large gaping orifices emerge from both of your hands, eager to nibble on anything."

Command the flesh vessel to morph with:
<color_yellow>juggernaut armament</color> - <color_white>meat shield</color>
"Your hands have fused together to form a meaty shield. It significantly hampers your movement, but has great blocking ability."

Command the flesh vessel to morph with:
<color_yellow>juggernaut armament</color> - <color_white>bone spikes</color>
"Sharp bone outgrowths emerges from your suit and cover most of your fatal extremeties. Grants great protection against impact, at a cost of mobility."

Command the flesh vessel to morph with:
<color_yellow>juggernaut armament</color> - <color_white>crystalline hardening</color>
"Your suit's surface hardens into crystal-like material, granting extreme damage reduction against all types but makes movement nearly impossible."

Command the flesh vessel to morph with:
<color_light_blue>gunner armament</color> - <color_white>spitter</color>
"An acid-spitting elongated proboscis-like limb that morph and protrude from one's shoulder. Consumes flesh to produce globs of blood acid."

Command the flesh vessel to morph with:
<color_light_blue>gunner armament</color> - <color_white>spitter (alt)</color>
"An acid-spitting elongated proboscis-like limb that morph and protrude from one's shoulder. Uses bionic power to produce globs of blood acid."

Command the flesh vessel to morph with:
<color_light_blue>gunner armament</color> - <color_white>bone lancer</color>
"One of your arms have swollen into a mass of flesh, with half of its proportion imitates that of a gun barrel. If fed, lines of strangely-shaped teeth will grow from it and these can be launched with great power."

Command the flesh vessel to morph with:
<color_light_green>agility armament</color> - <color_white>powerlegs</color>
"Formed on the vessel's knee joints are strong, elastic muscle fibers. It allows the user to move quicker and exert greater strength in performing acrobatic feats."
Networks of the flesh vessel's vein emerges from your suit. They attract external electrical discharges and redirect them out from your body, minimizing the damage dealt.
